dimension_description: How well does the pod control and optimize their flow of work?
question_text: The pod tracks workflow KPIs and clearly identifies bottlenecks in their process

dimension_description: How well does the pod control and optimize their flow of work?
question_text: How well does the pod manage concurrent work to maintain flow?
option_1_label: Chaos - Everyone works on everything constant context switching
option_2_label: Overloaded - People juggle many items lots of 90% done work
option_3_label: Some awareness - Pod tries to limit WIP but often fails under pressure
option_4_label: Usually controlled - Most members focus on 1-2 items occasional overload
option_5_label: Well managed - Clear focus items flow smoothly rare bottlenecks
option_6_label: Optimized flow - Pod proactively manages WIP pulls work at sustainable pace

dimension_description: How well does the pod control and optimize their flow of work?
question_text: The pod knows and actively works to reduce the time from "started" to "done"

dimension_description: How well does the pod control and optimize their flow of work?
question_text: Bottlenecks are made visible and the pod actively works to eliminate them

dimension_description: How well does the pod control and optimize their flow of work?
question_text: Dependencies with other pods (code reviews cross-pod projects) are identified and optimized to avoid delays

dimension_description: How well does the pod control and optimize their flow of work?
question_text: The number of items completed per sprint is predictable and stable

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: Each iteration has a proper preparation (refinement) and planning session

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: Daily check-ins effectively identify blockers and coordinate work

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: The pod demonstrates completed work and tracks delivery metrics each sprint

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: Product demos conducted with stakeholders this quarter

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: Backlog refinement happens regularly and keeps upcoming work ready

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: The pod has a dedicated ritual for continuous improvement each iteration (retrospective)

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: Pod member attendance at ceremonies

dimension_description: How effective are the pod's ceremonies and regular practices?
question_text: Pod members find the ceremonies valuable and wouldn't want to skip them

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: Sprint goals are clear and written by PM/EM
option_2_label: "Goal" is just the list of stories/tasks
option_3_label: Multiple goals to cover different priorities
option_5_label: Single goal focused on user/business value (outcome)
option_6_label: Single outcome goal with clear success metric

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: The pod has clear visibility of the portfolio of initiatives in their quarterly roadmap

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: The functional and technical source of truth is clearly identified and kept up-to-date by the pod

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: Sprint progress and blockers are visible to all pod members and stakeholders (Kanban board Up to date)

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: Regular clear communication keeps stakeholders informed of progress and challenges

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: Decisions are documented and communicated clearly
option_6_label: All decisions documented with context and rationale

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: How visible and trackable is all the pod's work?
option_1_label: Invisible work - No idea who works on what lots of surprise tasks
option_2_label: Scattered - Some work in Jira some in slack some nowhere
option_3_label: Partially visible - Main work tracked but side tasks are hidden
option_4_label: Mostly visible - Most work is tracked occasional invisible tasks
option_5_label: Fully transparent - All work visible everyone knows where to look
option_6_label: Optimized visibility - Real-time view of all work with clear status

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: The pod clearly understands the priority and rationale behind work items

dimension_description: How clear and transparent are goals progress and information?
question_text: Critical knowledge is documented and shared not held by individuals

dimension_description: How well does the pod deliver on commitments with quality?
question_text: How ready is work when the pod starts it?
option_1_label: Not ready - Immediately blocked can't even begin
option_2_label: Barely ready - Start but quickly blocked on basics
option_3_label: Somewhat ready - Can start but need significant clarifications
option_4_label: Mostly ready - Good to start minor clarifications needed
option_5_label: Well ready - Everything clear rare questions during work
option_6_label: Perfectly ready - Crystal clear zero blocks from start to done

dimension_description: How well does the pod deliver on commitments with quality?
question_text: When work is marked 'done' how complete is it really?
option_1_label: Done = coded - Always needs testing review documentation
option_2_label: Done = works on my machine - Often breaks in other environments
option_3_label: Done = technically complete - Functional but missing polish documentation
option_4_label: Done = mostly shippable - Small tweaks needed before release
option_5_label: Done = ready to ship - Could go to production immediately
option_6_label: Done = in production creating value - Deployed monitored validated by users

dimension_description: How well does the pod deliver on commitments with quality?
question_text: Sprint commitment completion rate

dimension_description: How well does the pod deliver on commitments with quality?
question_text: Test execution is owned by the entire pod to avoid bottlenecks in the workflow

dimension_description: How well does the pod deliver on commitments with quality?
question_text: Quality checks are built into the process and prevent defects from moving forward

dimension_description: How well does the pod deliver on commitments with quality?
question_text: Defect rate after work is marked "done"

dimension_description: How well does the pod deliver on commitments with quality?
question_text: Frequency of rework due to misunderstandings or quality issues

dimension_description: How well does the pod learn and evolve their practices?
question_text: Improvements implemented in how the pod works together this quarter

dimension_description: How well does the pod learn and evolve their practices?
question_text: Do retrospective actions lead to real improvements?
option_1_label: Actions lost - Identified but forgotten immediately
option_2_label: Actions logged nothing happens - Written somewhere never done
option_3_label: Few actions completed - Some effort but little change
option_4_label: Some improvements implemented - Visible progress on key items
option_5_label: Most improvements delivered - Real changes each sprint
option_6_label: Continuous improvement culture - Improvements + measurement of impact

dimension_description: How well does the pod learn and evolve their practices?
question_text: The pod regularly tries new practices and techniques

dimension_description: How well does the pod learn and evolve their practices?
question_text: Problems and failures are analyzed for root causes and learning (post-mortem)

dimension_description: How well does the pod learn and evolve their practices?
question_text: Fast feedback loops exist at multiple levels (code product process)

dimension_description: How well does the pod learn and evolve their practices?
question_text: Improvements and their impacts are celebrated and shared
